name: Search_Car_Rentals

pick_up_latitude.description: The pick up location's latitude. pick_up_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object.

pick_up_longitude.description: The pick up location's longitude. pick_up_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object.

drop_off_latitude.description: The drop off location's latitude. drop_off_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object.

drop_off_longitude.description: The drop off location's longitude. drop_off_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object.

pick_up_time.description:
Pick up time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

drop_off_time.description:
Drop off time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

driver_age.description:
The driver's age. The default value is set to 30.
Note: The driver age must be in the range of 20 to 65 years.

filters.description:
Used to refine search results based on specific suppliers, car categories, or other attributes. Multiple filters can be applied by passing them as a comma-separated list in the following format:
::
For example:
supplier::Avis,supplier::Budget,carCategory::medium,carCategory::large
This will return results from Avis and Budget, and only cars in the medium and large categories.
To discover available filters, make a request to the /api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals endpoint and refer to the data → filter section in the response.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

accessibility.supplier_rating: At this location, our customers have rated Budget as 7.6 out of 10, Good.

response_summary:
Here’s a summary of the car rental options available for your trip:  

You have a total of 75 rental cars to choose from, with prices starting at ₹54,122 for a 6-day rental. Three standout options include:  

1. **Chrysler Pacifica** (Mini category) from **Avis**, priced at ₹75,074. This 7-seater automatic vehicle comes with unlimited mileage and free cancellation. Avis has a "Good" rating of 7.6 based on 33 reviews, with pickup in Manhattan (220 West 31st Street) and drop-off at Logan International Airport. A security deposit of $250 is required.  

2. **Toyota Corolla** (Intermediate category) from **Budget**, priced at ₹54,613. This 5-seater includes a **Premium Package** with a free additional driver and a full tank of fuel. Budget also has a 7.6 rating (27 reviews) and offers free cancellation. Pickup is in Fort Lee (2121 Lemoine Ave), with a $300 deposit.  

3. **Kia Soul** (Compact category) also from **Budget**, priced at ₹52,849. Like the Corolla, it includes the Premium Package benefits and unlimited mileage.  

All vehicles feature automatic transmission, air conditioning, and unlimited mileage. You can filter results by **car type** (Small, Medium, Large), **supplier** (Avis, Budget), or **price range** (₹5,000–₹15,000 per day). Sorting options include **Best Recommendations**, **Lowest Price First**, or **Highest Review Score**.  

Pickup locations are mostly in **Manhattan**, with downtown suppliers like Avis and Budget offering competitive rates. Free cancellation is available for all listed options.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers seeking car rental options for their trips. It searches available rental cars based on pickup/drop-off locations, dates, and times, with filtering by supplier, car category, or price. Users receive detailed rental info including pricing, vehicle specs, supplier ratings, and cancellation policies. Sorting options include best recommendations, lowest price, or highest review scores.

enhanced_parameters.pick_up_latitude: Latitude coordinate for car pickup location.
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_longitude: Longitude coordinate for car pickup location.
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_latitude: Latitude coordinate for car drop-off location.
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_longitude: Longitude coordinate for car drop-off location.
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_date: Date when the car rental starts (YYYY-MM-DD).
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_date: Date when the car rental ends (YYYY-MM-DD).
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_time: Time when the car rental starts (24-hour format).
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_time: Time when the car rental ends (24-hour format).
enhanced_parameters.filters: Filters results by supplier, car category, or other attributes.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.
enhanced_parameters.location: Country or region code for location-based results.

search_results.description: List of car rental options available for the search query.

ar_items.description: Details of a single car rental option.

content.description: Additional content and metadata about the vehicle.

badges.description: List of badges or tags associated with the vehicle (e.g., free cancellation).

name.description: Name of the supplier (e.g., Avis, Budget).

imageUrl.description: URL of the supplier's logo image.

rawValue.description: Raw numeric value of the rating.

displayValue.description: Formatted display value of the rating.

subtitle.description: Subtitle of the rating (e.g., number of reviews).

vehicleSpecs.description: List of vehicle specifications (e.g., transmission type, mileage).

v_name.description: Name of the vehicle (e.g., Chrysler Pacifica).

unlimited_mileage.description: Indicates if the vehicle has unlimited mileage (1 for yes, 0 for no).

seats.description: Number of seats in the vehicle.

suitcases.description: Number of suitcases the vehicle can accommodate.

label.description: Label describing the vehicle category (e.g., Mini car with:).

image_thumbnail_url.description: URL of the vehicle's thumbnail image.

group_or_similar.description: Description of the vehicle group or similar vehicles.

fuel_type.description: Type of fuel used by the vehicle (e.g., N/A).

fuel_policy.description: Fuel policy (e.g., Like for like, Free Tank).

free_cancellation.description: Indicates if free cancellation is available (1 for yes, 0 for no).

doors.description: Number of doors on the vehicle.

cma_compliant.description: Indicates if the vehicle is CMA compliant (-1 for unknown).

aircon.description: Indicates if the vehicle has air conditioning (1 for yes, 0 for no).

airbags.description: Indicates if the vehicle has airbags (1 for yes, 0 for no).

name.description: Name of the supplier (e.g., Avis, Budget).

logo_url.description: URL of the supplier's logo image.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the pickup location.

route_info.description: Information about pickup and dropoff locations.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the pickup location.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for the pickup location.

icon.description: Icon identifier for the pickup location (nullable).

country_code.description: Country code of the pickup location.

country.description: Country name of the pickup location (nullable).

city.description: City name of the pickup location (nullable).

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the dropoff location.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for the dropoff location.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the dropoff location.

icon.description: Icon identifier for the dropoff location (nullable).

country_code.description: Country code of the dropoff location.

country.description: Country name of the dropoff location (nullable).

address.description: Full address of the dropoff location.

city.description: City name of the dropoff location (nullable).

rating_info.description: Rating details for the rental option.

average_text.description: Text description of the average rating (e.g., Very good).

efficiency.description: Rating for the rental process efficiency.

value_for_money.description: Rating for the value for money.

freebies.description: List of freebies or perks included with the rental.

pricing_info.description: Detailed pricing information for the rental.

drive_away_price_is_approx.description: Indicates if the drive-away price is approximate.

base_currency.description: Currency used for the base price and deposit.

quote_allowed.description: Indicates if a quote is allowed (1 for yes, 0 for no).

type.description: Type of fuel policy (e.g., RETURN_SAME, FREE_TANK).

amount.description: Amount associated with the fuel policy.

currency.description: Currency of the fuel policy amount (nullable).

known_fees.description: List of known fees associated with the rental.

is_always_payable.description: Indicates if the fee is always payable (1 for yes, 0 for no).

is_tax_included.description: Indicates if tax is included in the fee (1 for yes, 0 for no).

fuel_policy.description: Accessibility description of the fuel policy.

supplier_rating.description: Accessibility description of the supplier's rating.

pick_up_location.description: Accessibility description of the pickup location.

content.description: Additional content and metadata for the search results.

positionInList.description: Position of the item in the list.

label.description: Label for the content item (e.g., 75 results).

countLabel.description: Label for the count of results (e.g., 75 results).

supplierLocations.description: List of supplier locations on the map.

title.description: Title of the location (e.g., Manhattan - West 31st Street).

body.description: Body text of the location (e.g., address).

label.description: Label for the location (e.g., 13 cars · 1 suppliers).
Footer label (e.g., Price for 6 days: from ₹ 54,122).

supplierPinContent.description: Content for the supplier pin on the map.

filter.description: List of filters available for the search results.

title.description: Title of the filter (e.g., Car Type, Supplier).

is_collapsable.description: Indicates if the filter is collapsable (true/false as string).

is_collapsed.description: Indicates if the filter is collapsed (true/false as string).

collapsed_count.description: Number of items shown when collapsed.

categories.description: List of categories within the filter.

name.description: Name of the category (e.g., Small, Medium).

nameWithCount.description: Name of the category with count (e.g., Small (6)).

count.description: Number of items in the category.

sort.description: List of sorting options for the search results.

name.description: Name of the sorting option (e.g., Recommended – best first).

identifier.description: Unique identifier for the sorting option.

title_tag.description: Title tag for the sorting option.

search_key.description: Encoded search key for the query.

searchKey.description: Encoded search key for the query.

is_genius_location.description: Indicates if the location is a Genius location.
